original_text: And they took ashes of the furnace, and stood before Pharaoh; and Moses sprinkled it up toward heaven; and it became a boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast.
korean_text: 그들이 화덕의 재를 가지고 바로 앞에 서서 모세가 하늘을 향하여 날리니 사람과 짐승에게 붙어 악성 종기가 생기고

sentences.original_text: And they took ashes of the furnace
and Moses sprinkled it up toward heaven
and it became a boil breaking forth with blains
